languages.text: Магос Ханейманн вызывается возглавить наблюдательный отряд. Его увлеченность ксеносскими устройствами граничит с ересью, однако по возвращении он долго не предоставляет доклада Лорд-капитану. Позже Паскаль признается, что обескуражен пропастью между научными достижениями ксеносов и возможностями техножрецов Империума.

traits.locale_text: По словам магоса Ханейманна, это технологическая аномалия, порожденная разрушением генераторов энергии для манипуляции материей и пространством, чья природа непостижима даже для Адептус Механикус и слишком опасна для исследования.

languages.text: Magos Haneumann volunteers to lead the observation team. His passion for the xenos' devices borders on heresy, and he takes a long time after his return to report to the Lord Captain. Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.
languages.original_text: Магос Ханейманн вызывается возглавить наблюдательный отряд. Его увлеченность ксеносскими устройствами граничит с ересью, однако по возвращении он долго не предоставляет доклада Лорд-капитану. Позже Паскаль признается, что обескуражен пропастью между научными достижениями ксеносов и возможностями техножрецов Империума.

Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.

Magos Haneumann volunteers to lead the observation team. His passion for the xenos' devices borders on heresy, and he takes a long time after his return to report to the Lord Captain. Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.

languages.text: 哈努曼贤者自发领导了观察小组。他对异形装置的热情近乎异端，在返回之后，他花了很长时间向领主舰长汇报他的观察结果。在这之后，帕斯卡承认，异形科学成就与现代技术神甫能力之间的差距令他感到沮丧。
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann volunteers to lead the observation team. His passion for the xenos' devices borders on heresy, and he takes a long time after his return to report to the Lord Captain. Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.

traits.locale_text: 哈努曼贤者自发领导了观察小组。他对异形装置的热情近乎异端，在返回之后，他花了很长时间向领主舰长汇报他的观察结果。在这之后，帕斯卡承认，异形科学成就与现代技术祭司能力之间的差距令他感到沮丧。

languages.text: マゴス・ヘニュマンがボランティアで観測チームを率いている。異種族の装置に対する彼の情熱は異端とも言えるもので、帰還してもロード・キャプテンに報告するまでに長い時間がかかる。後にパスカルは、異種族の科学功績と現代の技術司祭の能力とのギャップに落胆していることを認めている。
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann volunteers to lead the observation team. His passion for the xenos' devices borders on heresy, and he takes a long time after his return to report to the Lord Captain. Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.

traits.locale_text: マゴス・ヘニュマンがボランティアで観測チームを率いている。異種族の装置に対する彼の情熱は異端とも言えるもので、帰還してもロード・キャプテンに報告するまでに長い時間がかかる。後にパスカルは、異種族の科学功績と現代の技術司祭の能力とのギャップに落胆していることを認めている。

languages.text: El Magos Haneumann se ofrece voluntario para dirigir el equipo de observación. Su pasión por los xenoartefactos roza la herejía, y tarda mucho tiempo tras su regreso en presentarse ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Más tarde, Pasqal admite que le desanima la brecha entre los logros científicos xenos y las capacidades de los tecnosacerdotes modernos.
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann volunteers to lead the observation team. His passion for the xenos' devices borders on heresy, and he takes a long time after his return to report to the Lord Captain. Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.

traits.locale_text: El Magos Haneumann se ofrece voluntario para dirigir el equipo de observación. Su pasión por los xenoartefactos roza la herejía, y tarda mucho tiempo tras su regreso en presentarse ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Más tarde, Pasqal admite que le desanima la brecha entre los logros científicos xenos y las capacidades de los tecnosacerdotes modernos.

languages.text: Magos Haneumann meldet sich freiwillig als Anführer für das Erkundungsteam. Seine Leidenschaft für die Geräte der Xenos grenzt schon an Ketzerei, und er erstattet dem Lord Captain nach seiner Rückkehr lange Bericht. Später gesteht Pasqal, dass ihn die Lücke zwischen den wissenschaftlichen Errungenschaften der Xenos und den Fähigkeiten moderner Techpriester frustriert.
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann volunteers to lead the observation team. His passion for the xenos' devices borders on heresy, and he takes a long time after his return to report to the Lord Captain. Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.

traits.locale_text: Magos Haneumann meldet sich freiwillig als Anführer für das Erkundungsteam. Seine Leidenschaft für die Geräte der Xenos grenzt schon an Ketzerei, und er erstattet dem Lord Captain nach seiner Rückkehr lange Bericht. Später gesteht Pasqal, dass ihn die Lücke zwischen den wissenschaftlichen Errungenschaften der Xenos und den Fähigkeiten moderner Techpriester frustriert.

languages.text: Le magos Haneumann se porte volontaire pour superviser l'équipe d'exploration. Sa passion pour les engins xénos confine à l'hérésie, et à son retour, il s'attarde longuement avant d'aller faire son rapport {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Plus tard, Pasqal reconnaît qu'il est découragé par le fossé qui sépare les avancées technologiques xénos et les capacités des technoprêtres modernes.
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann volunteers to lead the observation team. His passion for the xenos' devices borders on heresy, and he takes a long time after his return to report to the Lord Captain. Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.

traits.locale_text: Le magos Haneumann se porte volontaire pour superviser l'équipe d'exploration. Sa passion pour les engins xénos confine à l'hérésie, et à son retour, il s'attarde longuement avant d'aller faire son rapport {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Plus tard, Pasqal reconnaît qu'il est découragé par le fossé qui sépare les avancées technologiques xénos et les capacités des technoprêtres modernes.

languages.text: Magos Haneumann gözlem ekibine önderlik etmeye gönüllü oluyor. Zeno cihazlarına duyduğu tutku kâfirliği andıran Pasqal, döndükten sonra Lord Kaptan'a rapor vermekte gecikiyor. Bir süre geçince Pasqal, zenoların bilimsel başarıları ile modern Tekno Rahiplerin kabiliyetleri arasındaki uçurumdan cesaretinin kırıldığını itiraf ediyor.
languages.original_text: Magos Haneumann volunteers to lead the observation team. His passion for the xenos' devices borders on heresy, and he takes a long time after his return to report to the Lord Captain. Later, Pasqal admits that he is discouraged by the gap between the scientific accomplishments of the xenos and the capabilities of modern Tech-Priests.
